channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Qi2 Wireless Charging: Everything You Need to Know (2025)
item.description: Borrowing from Apple’s MagSafe, Qi2 enables faster, more efficient magnetic wireless charging.

item.title: The Young, Inexperienced Engineers Aiding Elon Musk’s Government Takeover
item.description: Engineers between 19 and 24, most linked to Musk’s companies, are playing a key role as he seizes control of federal infrastructure.

item.title: 69 'Buy It for Life' Products: Cast-Iron, Tools, Speakers, Chairs, and More
